Label: SC_CARRIER_SPECIFIC
Comment: "Bonbon users can send free SMS to 13977 short code.\nhttp://www.bonbon.hr/ponuda/pretplata/paketi/"

Label: SC_EMERGENCY
Comment: "93 (fire dep) and 94 (ambulance) don't appear in the latest ITU document, but still on\nvarious websites. Need to verify that they are no longer valid before removing."

Label: SC_PREMIUM_RATE
Comment: "ITU doc says 118XX short codes are directory enquiry services and cost is standard\n/ premium rate. Adding 118XX to premium rate so that products are aware of the\npossibility of premium rate numbers under 118 range."

Label: XML_UAN
Comment: "ITU numbering specifies the length of the numbers with prefix 62 as 8, but there\nare numbers on the internet with 7 digits after the prefix too."
